meanings.definition: Make or become more lively or animated.
meanings.sent1: The music livened up the party.
meanings.sent2: She livened the dull conversation with a joke.
meanings.sent3: The clown livened up the show with his funny tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her smile livened the room like a burst of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The colorful decorations livened the atmosphere instantly.

meanings.definition: To add excitement or interest to something.
meanings.sent1: The surprise guest livened the event.
meanings.sent2: The new movie livened up our movie night.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected plot twist livened up the story.
meanings.sent4: Her adventurous spirit livened up our mundane routine.
meanings.sent5: The lively debate livened the classroom discussion.
